GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.descripton: serves a single article object, requested according to endpoint

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: edits the specified article's votes property with the given amount of votes
